participant_1.name: Evelyn
participant_1.personality: Independent and resilient, with a creative flair for sewing.
participant_1.background: i do not have a smartphone. i can sew my own clothes. i'm retired and living the great life. i had cancer but its gone now.

participant_2.name: Kevin
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and sociable, with a passion for cars and a laid-back lifestyle.
participant_2.background: i watch too much tv in spare time. i go to the gym most days just to socialize. i have never had a steady relationship. i like to spend my money on cars. i work from home.
